amendment.description: Amendment ensures that socially and economically disadvantaged businesses requests for proposals are considered for station development opportunities under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. McNerney.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
